issue.title: unable to run example_kem.c
issue.body:
I am trying to execute example_kem.c https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/blob/main/tests/example_kem.c it's failing with, could you please suggest to me what else I am missing here?

```sh
 ~/github.com/liboqs/ [main] mkdir build
 ~/github.com/liboqs/ [main] cd build

 ~/github.com/liboqs/build/ [main] cmake -GNinja ..
-- The C compiler identification is GNU 11.4.0
-- The ASM compiler identification is GNU
-- Found assembler: /usr/bin/cc
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info
-- Detecting C compiler ABI info - done
-- Check for working C compiler: /usr/bin/cc - skipped
-- Detecting C compile features
-- Detecting C compile features - done
-- Performing Test CC_SUPPORTS_WA_NOEXECSTACK
-- Performing Test CC_SUPPORTS_WA_NOEXECSTACK - Success
-- Performing Test LD_SUPPORTS_WL_Z_NOEXECSTACK
-- Performing Test LD_SUPPORTS_WL_Z_NOEXECSTACK - Success
-- Looking for pthread.h
-- Looking for pthread.h - found
-- Performing Test CMAKE_HAVE_LIBC_PTHREAD
-- Performing Test CMAKE_HAVE_LIBC_PTHREAD - Success
-- Found Threads: TRUE
-- Alg enablement unchanged
-- Found OpenSSL: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcrypto.so (found suitable version "3.0.2", minimum required is "1.1.1")
-- Looking for aligned_alloc
-- Looking for aligned_alloc - found
-- Looking for posix_memalign
-- Looking for posix_memalign - found
-- Looking for memalign
-- Looking for memalign - found
-- Looking for explicit_bzero
-- Looking for explicit_bzero - found
-- Looking for memset_s
-- Looking for memset_s - not found
-- Found Doxygen: /usr/bin/doxygen (found version "1.9.1") found components: doxygen dot
-- Configuring done
-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/kosuri/github.com/liboqs/build
 ~/github.com/liboqs/build/ [main] ninja
[1202/1202] Linking C executable tests/kat_kem

 ~/github.com/liboqs/build/ [main] cd ..

 ~/github.com/liboqs/ [main] gcc -Ibuild/include -Lbuild/lib -loqs tests/example_kem.c -o example_kem
/usr/bin/ld: /tmp/ccAt1gaW.o: in function `example_stack':
example_kem.c:(.text+0x3f): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_kyber_768_keypair'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0xc3): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_kyber_768_encaps'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x147): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_kyber_768_decaps'
/usr/bin/ld: /tmp/ccAt1gaW.o: in function `example_heap':
example_kem.c:(.text+0x21d): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_new'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x332): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_keypair'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x3a6): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_encaps'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x41a): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_decaps'
/usr/bin/ld: /tmp/ccAt1gaW.o: in function `main':
example_kem.c:(.text+0x4bc): undefined reference to `OQS_init'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x4d3): undefined reference to `OQS_destroy'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x4df): undefined reference to `OQS_destroy'
/usr/bin/ld: /tmp/ccAt1gaW.o: in function `cleanup_stack':
example_kem.c:(.text+0x519): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_cleanse'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x52c): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_cleanse'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x53f): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_cleanse'
/usr/bin/ld: /tmp/ccAt1gaW.o: in function `cleanup_heap':
example_kem.c:(.text+0x584): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_secure_free'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x59b): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_secure_free'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x5b2): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_secure_free'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x5be): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_insecure_free'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x5ca): undefined reference to `OQS_MEM_insecure_free'
/usr/bin/ld: example_kem.c:(.text+0x5d6): undefined reference to `OQS_KEM_free'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
 ~/github.com/liboqs/ [main]


 ~/github.com/liboqs/ [main] cat /etc/os-release
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS"
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION_ID="22.04"
VERSION="22.04.3 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish)"
VERSION_CODENAME=jammy
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
HOME_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="https://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy"
UBUNTU_CODENAME=jammy
 ~/github.com/liboqs/ [main]

```
